Articles.Content: is this a mod i see that allows people to put thierships names below the flag?

2 hours ago, grant977 said:

is this a mod i see that allows people to put thier ships names below the flag?

Is there an example of this? I haven't noticed such a thing.
I've seen them recently in the 'What did you do today in KSP ?'-thread and I want this mod too.. but I guess it shouldn't be impossible with google.

Searched the forums and google, wasn't able to find any such mod sadly.

What those people you saw are more than likely doing is editing the flag file to add the name, the same way you would to make any custom flag.

This is definitely a feature that should be in the game! I wonder how difficult this would be to implement in a mod? Apparently at one point in KSP's development a "decal system" was planned but scrapped, hopefully it'll make it's way back in at some point.
The mod I use for this is an old one called Nebula Decals. Last updated for 0.25 but still works in 1.0+. Uses Firespitter.dll for texture switching and TweakScale for re-sizing.
If there comes a point where the mod stops working, the other option is to make some flags with the names you want under them, then change the mission flag in the VAB/SPH
